title: Another Vanguard: Seidou no Asuka
original_name: アナザーヴァンガード 星導のアスカ
sinopse:
Hot-blooded highschool girl Asuka Matsumoto struggles as the manager of a card shop in place of her father. Even so, aiming for Asuka's special cards are the assassins of the card gang "Crown" who will attack one after another.

(Source: Bushiroad Media, translated)
